snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan, the top seeds and a doubles juggernaut for more than a decade, crashed out of the United States Open in the first round Wednesday night.
abstract: Sam Querrey and Steve Johnson defeat Bob and Mike Bryan in first round doubles match at United States Open tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan, the top seeds and a doubles juggernaut for more than a decade, crashed out of the United States Open in the first round Wednesday night.

headline.main: Bryan Brothers, Five-Time Champions, Lose Opener
headline.print_headline: Bryan Brothers, Five-Time Champions, Lose Opener
